# Resources
A much better and more organized note-taking repo:
https://github.com/deadmanoz/boss-2025-playground

## Learn Me a Bitcoin
https://learnmeabitcoin.com/

## BIP32 Test Vectors
https://en.bitcoin.it/wiki/BIP_0032_TestVectors

## Minsc Tool (used to help identify correct sighash)
### P2WPKH: 
https://min.sc/v0.3/#c=%24tprv%20%3D%20tprv8ZgxMBicQKsPcyrUyDu72orgqegsBPZbbayGeTNWSsjUuSc62v5mCnnCky82jUDpPxHnoLcd9abuZ4S2fJhvov3u1TpJ8XTCtKcXjNjZQpb%3B%20%20%2F%2F%20enter%20your%20key%20here%20%0A%0A%2F%2F%20Sanity%20check%20-%20should%20match%20the%20address%20of%20the%20spent%20output%20-%20update%20your%20index%0Aassert%3A%3Aeq%28address%28wpkh%28%24tprv%2F84h%2F1h%2F0h%2F0%2F1290%29%29%2C%20tb1qcpygvxs74q3u3mae7yqr7t3w88d5yjd4e7gjar%29%3B%0A%0A%0A%24tx%20%3D%20tx%%29%3B%0A%24tx_no_witness%20%3D%20tx%3A%3Awith_witness%28%24tx%2C%20%5B%200%3A%20%5B%5D%20%5D%29%3B%0A%0A%2F%2F%20make%20sure%20this%20is%20the%20output%20amount%0A%24sighash%20%3D%20tx%3A%3Asighash%28%24tx_no_witness%2C%200%2C%20%5B%20tb1qcpygvxs74q3u3mae7yqr7t3w88d5yjd4e7gjar%3A0.03916732%20BTC%20%5D%2C%20SIGHASH_ALL%29%3B%0A%2F%2F%20update%20the%20key%20index%0A%24signature%20%3D%20ecdsa%3A%3Asign%28%24tprv%2F84h%2F1h%2F0h%2F0%2F1290%2C%20%24sighash%29%20%2B%20SIGHASH_ALL%3B%0A%0A%0A

### P2WSH:
